intro.subtitle: Naturopath RME
intro.punchline: The right push, in the right place.
intro.description: A gentle manual treatment to support lymphatic circulation, lighten the body and promote a feeling of harmony and lightness.

about.title: About the technique
description: A naturopath specializing in lymphatic drainage, I accompany people who want to regain lightness and better body balance.
My approach is intuitive and precise, centered on the body’s function and respect for its rhythm. Lymphatic drainage supports circulation, reduces tension and promotes better elimination.
Each session is personalized, with a clear objective: to improve well-being in a lasting and concrete way.

pressure.title: Pressure
pressure.description: Light and precise—to encourage flow without compressing the vessels.

rhythm.title: Rhythm
rhythm.description: Steady and calming, so the session is both effective and relaxing.

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: 60 minutes; most people feel lighter and more at ease afterwards.

about.details: The treatment follows the direction of the lymphatic vessels, starting in the neck to open the main drainage areas. The goal is to support the body's ability to drain, detoxify, and regenerate—gently and precisely.

items.title: Feeling of heaviness
items.description: Gentle techniques to ease tension and support a sense of lightness in the body.

items.title: Water retention
items.description: Stimulation of lymph flow to support natural drainage and reduce fluid retention.

items.title: Edema
items.description: Careful and targeted work to support traffic flow and comfort in the affected areas.

items.title: Fatigue, stress
items.description: Calming, rhythmic movements to help restore balance and ease stress.

items.title: Post-operative support
items.description: As medically indicated, to support healing and recovery after surgery.

interior.title: Interior
interior.paragraph1: Sessions take place at Espace Anahata in Fribourg—a calm, discreet environment designed for rest and recovery.
interior.paragraph2: The practice room is kept clean and quiet so you can fully let go. Natural light and a neutral setting help create a sense of ease from the moment you arrive.
